se.kth.iv1350.registersystem.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.kth.iv1350.registersystem.controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The Controller - per default an intermediate layer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller()
      Creates a new Controller instance combined with a new Register and DatabaseHandler instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller()
        Creates a new Controller instance combined with a new Register and DatabaseHandler instance. Each Controller object is immutable.

    • Method Detail

      • initiateSale

        public void initiateSale()
        Initiates a new sale.

      • scanItem

        public SaleDTO scanItem(int quantity,
                        java.lang.String identifier)
        Retrieves inventory from database and attempts to register specified quantity of retrieved inventory in the sale.
        Parameters:
        quantity - The quantity of the inventory to be registered.
        identifier - The inventory to be registered. If inventory doesn't exist, null is passed.
        Returns:
        An object containing the description and price of the item, as well as the running total of the sale. If quantity is invalid or inventory doesn't exist, returns an object which item description specifies it's invalid.

      • applyDiscount

        public SaleDTO applyDiscount(java.lang.String id)
        Retrieves customer from database and attempts to apply discount to current sale.
        Parameters:
        id - The personal number identifying the customer.
        Returns:
        An object containing running total, discounted total and discount type.

      • pay

        public SaleDTO pay(double amount)
        Pays the sale.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount being paid.
        Returns:
        An object containing the sale details of the receipt. If the sale was not finalized, the amount by which the payment was short.

      • retrieveLog

        public SaleDTO retrieveLog(int index)
        Retrieves receipt of specified sale from SaleLog.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the sale to be retrieved. Logs are stored in chronological order where higher index means older sale.
        Returns:
        The sale details of the receipt. If sale doesn't exist, returns null.

      • retrieveLogCount

        public int retrieveLogCount()
        Retrieves number of logged sales.
        Returns:
        The number of sales that have been logged in the SaleLog.

      • interpretInput

        public boolean interpretInput(java.lang.String input,
                              java.lang.String pattern)
        Interprets if the input data matches the given pattern.
        Parameters:
        input - The input to be tested.
        pattern - The string or pattern to test the input against.
        Returns:
        A boolean true if matches, false otherwise.
